game.name: Street Fight King of the Gang
game.description:
The big fighters of the city are waiting for you on the street. Can you dare to enter their area, fight like a pro and rule this street gang like never before? If this is the case, then join Street Fight King of the Gang and be prepared knock-out all the popular fighters of the city. Get ready to put your insane fighting abilities to the test to prove yourself in a series of the bare-knuckled brawls! Practice your punches and kicks properly to defeat them fast! 
These gangsters are very dangerous and know how to throw you out of the fight. Come forward, and fight various other members of the gang using your own fighting spirit! Do uppercut, cross, jab and whatever you can to win the fight in this brand new action-packed challenge! You also have to take care of dodging during the gameplay to survive until you win. Put your eyes on the screen to get the master of dealing with the increasing difficulty of your enemies!
Judge the hits of your opponents in advance and try to test your reflexes as nice as you can to become a real gang king in this HTML5 fighting game! Completing a few fights successfully will help you to awake your warrior soul like never before! There are various punches like dodging, cross, jab and uppercut to use. Good luck to knock-out all your enemies to be the king of the street fight! This cool street fighting game features hours of gameplay, fun to play, leaderboard and amazing graphics.

game.mobileControlKeys: LEFT RIGHT ARROW TO MOVE THE PUNCH,TAP DOUBLE PUNCH TO STOP THE ATTACK, TAP SINGLE PUNCHS TO HIT
